```{r}
library(rOpenserver)

# pserver <- OpenServer$new()
pserver <- OpenServer()

cmd = "PROSPER.START"
pserver$DoCmd(cmd)

Sys.sleep(4)

command = "PROSPER.SHUTDOWN"
pserver$DoCmd(command)
pserver <- NULL
```
